mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_idx desc

select nvl(count(*), 0) from notice
notice_title like '%' || #{ search_text } || '%'
notice_category like '%' || #{ search_text } || '%'
select * from notice where notice_idx = #{ notice_idx }
mapper.insert: insert into notice values(seq_notice_idx.nextVal, #{notice_category}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{notice_author})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_view_count = #{ notice_view_count }+1 where notice_idx = #{ notice_idx }
